Text:
Thanks for this one.
Great to have it. And in such great quality.
Fast upload
I love classics; keep them coming.
Plays properly in 4:3 on VLC player but my Oppo would only play it 16:9. Paramount did a great job on the restoration but please someone put this out properly.

Thanks a million! :)
Is there any chance you could upload 'My Best Girl' and 'Get Your Man' from 1927 as well? Both star Buddy Rogers.
